p.s: In the text British Prime Minister address at COP26 World Leaders' Summit Opening Ceremony from the November 1st of 2021, Boris Johnson talks about our possibility and our duty to take action now in stopping climate change in order to rescue our future and within our future generations.
The perception of climate change is still quietquite unreal.
It is hard to invest money and work into a problem that is not a visual threat to someone, but still: talking was yesterday and today the time has come to act.
We have to pay climate fonds to countries that need it in order take action theirselfes, but not only money is needed: we need to work joint and offer development assistance.
We can use green energy to become a wealthy country.
All our actions should intend preserving our future from destruction.
Our future generations will depend on dad and will also be thankfullthankful.
Boris has already made impressions on how these big events like Glasgow ended and surely the talking should be converted into action.
Since 200 years industrial countries only offered ignoraceignorance of the problem and this is still taking place when we look at the promised fonds from the Paris agreement.
Despite that decarbonization is needed in order to reach the goal of 1.5 degrees per century.
COP26 is the last oportunityopportunity to shift our mindset into preserving out earth from great danger and working joint as we got the same enemy: climate change.
